about_the_game:
Explore the Vast Ruins: An Action-Adventure Game

Setting

The story unfolds in the ruins of a massive space colony.

Overview:

Join the protagonist, "Eri," and her companion, "Will," as they unravel the mysteries hidden within the ruins.

Key Features

Exploration of a Vast World

Venture into the expansive ruins of the space colony with Eri.

Rows of towering buildings and deserted homes may seem lifeless at first glance, but closer inspection reveals unexpected discoveries and traces of history.

Post-Apocalyptic Meals to Break the Journey

When the adventure wears you down, take a moment to eat.

Savoring a solitary meal in the desolation of the ruins is an unparalleled experience.

name: MOTHERLAND

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: MOTHERLAND is an open-world adventure set in the ruins of a massive space colony. Join Ellie, a protagonist who has lost her memory, and her companion Will as they freely explore the abandoned city. With no restrictions, players are free to explore and uncover the mysteries of this vast world.
